basics.name: Vladislav Tishchenko
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with a 7-year proven track record of delivering high-value digital solutions. Expert in driving systemic architecture advancements and optimizing user-centric design to accelerate project delivery and amplify user satisfaction. Leverage AI tools to accelerate delivery and improve code quality

work.name: Merkeleon
work.summary:
Product: High-loaded distributed game aggregation platform with an average of 50k TPS
Tech Stack: Go, ClickHouse, Kafka, PostgreSQL, Redis, Prometheus, Grafana, Kubernetes, Hetzner
highlights: Managed and executed a currency validation initiative, resulting in a 70% reduction in time and errors, and significantly enhancing the process quality for projects in the setup stage
Leveraged advanced distributed tracing to analyse and resolve response latency issues, boosting performance by 27%
Pioneered a dependency inversion framework initiative, achieving a 30% improvement in the new service development process and significantly enhancing service delivery
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver a new rollout process, achieving a 20% speedup in build time and enabling granular deployments within 2 months
Optimised the local development process, reducing time-to-market (TTM) by 6% and increasing overall efficiency

work.name: Gelato
work.summary:
Product: Global B2B E-Commerce Platform for Print-on-Demand
Tech Stack: Go, PHP, PostgreSQL, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, Redis, Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana, Kubernetes, AWS
highlights: Authored a service for preliminary calculation of the production cost per production partner per volume, leading to improving the decision-making routing process with a delivery cost reduction of 40%
Transitioned Pricing and Agreement services from PHP to Go, reducing feature development time by 50% and multiplying new price processing capacity and speed
Spearheaded a 4-person engineering team utilising Agile to build a scalable financial service, boosting productivity by 40% and accelerating feature time-to-market by 20%
Introduced packaged updates for product parameters using changesets, enabling live change previews, enhancing user experience and contributing to a 5% NPS uplift

work.name: Noveo Group
work.summary:
Product: Retailer-based Advertising Platform - a platform to advertise dynamic product carousels on social media
Tech Stack: Go, PostgreSQL, ClickHouse, ElasticSearch, Prometheus, Grafana, Kubernetes, AWS
highlights: Designed and implemented a service to generate a static landing page per advertisement on the fly, improving the user satisfaction rate by 35%
Established service to generate a dynamic product carousel, increasing system efficiency by 25% and trimming cloud provider expenses
Introduced an authentication and authorisation service for secure system access and user rights management, allowing granular access to the system components

work.name: Astral
work.summary:
Product: Fiscal Data Operation System - transmitting fiscal data to tax authorities from cash registers
Tech Stack: Go, NSQ, MongoDB, Redis, ClickHouse, ElasticSearch, Prometheus, Grafana, Baremetal
highlights: Designed and implemented highly data-intensive data processing services from cash registers
Pioneered referral offers system, leading to increased Gross Profit Margin by 15%
Crafted a notification system that reduces message delivery latency to clients by 70%
Accomplished a statistical tracking and analytics service for incoming document flow, enabling real-time alerting and reacting to incidents

work.name: 3BET
work.summary: Product: Sure Bet System - an automated bookmaker's parsing system for finding sure bet situations
highlights:
Built bookmaker scrapers to extend the range of supported sure bet situations for different bookmakers, leading to an increased number of sure bets with greater audience coverage
Stack: Go, Redis, WebSocket, PostgreSQL

Devised a trading bot for a defined strategy on a crypto exchange, which led to a fixed percentage of profit based on the deposit, with minimal risks
Stack: Go, Redis, PostgreSQL, Telegram Bot API

Developed a monitoring system for the automatic processing of errors in parsing services
Stack: Go, Redis, PostgreSQL, Prometheus, Grafana

education.institution: Tomsk State University of Control Systems and Radioelectronics
